name: EQUAL (=)
description: Use this command to set the receiving field to the value of an expression.

parameters.name: receiving_field
parameters.description: The field that is going to be changed.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: The expression that is providing the data. This can be as simple as a numeric constant, 1, or a very complex expression that uses functions and UDFs.

comments: If the two field types are not the same the program will attempt to convert the expression to the type of the receiving_field.
